channel.title: Gauntlet Con Admission for Free: Scholarship & Volunteering
channel.description:
Gauntlet Con is announcing two ways to get into Gauntlet Con for free:
* Gauntlet Con scholarship for participants who are students, facing financial hardships, and/or members of marginalized communities. * Gauntlet Con support volunteers for those who can provide 6-8 hours of assistance with either the convention helpdesk or admin support.
![image|443x443](upload://boPwLS8KmhYzB7p9S5jLjJeC2KG.jpeg)
Gauntlet Con is an entirely online convention that will run from Oct. 24-27. We've got over 100 games on the calendar and over 80 still have space for players (and all of them have waitlists!).
Find our more and get links to apply (or purchase PayPal or Patreon admission) here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/gauntlet-con-2019-registration.html
